document_data.name: Mirea Sain
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mirea Sain''' was a seasoned [[hunter]] operating out of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I am a huntress.|Mirea Sain}}
document_data.Personality: She was a woman of few words.
document_data.Relationships: Mirea was a member of the [[Hunters' Guild of Chult]], and took an active role in acquiring equipment—particularly [[leather armor]]—for the guild. She could often be found at [[Hunter's Square]] in Port Nyanzaru as she planned her hunts and purchased lures.
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]]{{ToA-time}} Mirea contacted Port Nyanzaru's [[Tearah Initoo|Master of the Market]] in order to find a [[leatherworker]] who could fashion durable equipment out of [[manticore]] hide.
